Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to providing discounted congestion charge rates for electric or hydrogen fuel cell vehicles
Summary: Relates to providing discounted congestion charge rates for electric or hydrogen fuel cell vehicles; electric and hydrogen fuel cell vehicles shall be charged one-third of the rate established to reduce congestion.
LawCode: Add ยง2858, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing discounted congestion charge rates for electric or hydrogen fuel cell vehicles
